snippet: The political scientist Charles Murray has a new book, “Coming Apart,” which depicts members of white elites as hypocrites living in a bubble and the white working class as succumbing to moral decay.
abstract: Controversial political scientist Charles Murray releases book Coming Apart: The State of White America, 1960-2010, which depicts members of white elites as hypocrites living in a bubble and the white working class as succumbing to moral decay.
lead_paragraph: The political scientist Charles Murray has a new book, “Coming Apart,” which depicts members of white elites as hypocrites living in a bubble and the white working class as succumbing to moral decay.

headline.seo: Charles Murray’s ‘Coming Apart: The State of White America’
headline.main: A Lightning Rod in the Storm Over America’s Class Divide
headline.print_headline: A Lightning Rod in the Storm Over America’s Class Divide
